statements: SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_id, product_name, specification FROM product_details ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM product_details WHERE price < 100
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE specification LIKE '%water%'
SELECT * FROM product_details WHERE product_id = 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, specification FROM product_details WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, specification FROM product_details WHERE specification IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_specifications WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM product_specifications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_information WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT list_price, discounted_price FROM pricing_information WHERE discount_rate > 0.1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_specifications WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, list_price, discount_rate, discounted_price FROM pricing_information ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM product_specifications GROUP BY category;
SELECT product_id, product_name, list_price, discounted_price FROM pricing_information WHERE discounted_price < list_price;
SELECT * FROM product_specifications WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM pricing WHERE price < 100;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM pricing WHERE supplier_id = 1);
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, pr.price FROM products p JOIN pricing pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id JOIN suppliers s ON pr.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE description ILIKE '%high quality%';
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing pr JOIN suppliers s ON pr.supplier_id = s.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING AVG(price) > 200;
SELECT product_id, product_name, base_price FROM ProductSpecifications INNER JOIN PricingInformation ON ProductSpecifications.product_id = PricingInformation.product_id;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM ContractInformation ORDER BY start_date DESC, contract_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductSpecifications;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, category FROM ProductSpecifications ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description, manufacturer, category FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT * FROM PricingInformation WHERE base_price > 100 AND discount < 0.1 ORDER BY base_price DESC;

SELECT SupplierInformation.supplier_name, SupplierInformation.contact_person, ContractInformation.start_date FROM SupplierInformation INNER JOIN ContractInformation ON SupplierInformation.supplier_id = ContractInformation.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM suppliers JOIN procurement ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement.supplier_id JOIN products ON procurement.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, specification FROM products WHERE LENGTH(specification) > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, contact_person ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id INNER JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.product_name ASC, c.category_name DESC;
